channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pathfinders
channel.desc: This episode explores composer Dame Gillian Whiteheads diverse and innovative career that blends T?onga Puoro and traditional musical compositions. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Something For The People
channel.desc: A weekly Live Breakfast and late-night M?ori satire show, that combines Whakaata M?ori Te Ao News, Arataua's Haka Yarns, and Code (for the old people) all into one. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: M? Te Atea
channel.desc: Taramainuku comes to life, through animation. Dr Jeremy T?tere Macleod and Professor Rangi M?t?mua share with us tales of Matariki and the journey through the stars. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Haka At Home
channel.desc: Some of the best kapa haka from around Aotearoa perform on their home ground, sharing their history and stories through their songs. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Amplify
channel.desc: Emerging spoken word artist Zoey Roy (Cree) takes us home to Saskatoon where a meeting with the legendary Maria Campbell inspires a song about the power of celebration. Directed by Candy Fox. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join the dynamic trio Chey Milne, Tawaroa Kawana and Jordyn With A Why as they celebrate music through a distinctly M?ori lens. Reti Hedley, member of the band IA, shares his creative talents. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?karo Tribe
channel.desc: Takaro Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Rakau and Talking Pond Koka live. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?karo Tribe
channel.desc: Takaro Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Rakau and Talking Pond Koka live. (R).

channel.title: P?kana 2025
channel.desc: Te Reo M?ori entertainment programme for Kura and Kura Kaupapa tamariki / taiohi. (R).

channel.title: Ng? Kapa Haka Kura Tuarua 2024
channel.desc: Highlights of the most prestigious M?ori kapa haka event on the school calendar. (R).

channel.title: Ng? Kapa Haka Kura Tuarua 2024

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ariki
channel.desc: In this episode, Whiti Te R?, from Hoani Waititi, is up against T? from our host rohe of Te Arawa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Wairua (Te Reo)
channel.desc: Spiritual Beings Children. This episode is about the wairua of unborn children and what happens to their wairua in the event of death, stillborn, miscarriage or abortion. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Waka Huia is an iconic archival series recording the unique stories and histories of Maori for all New Zealanders. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Fresh 2025
channel.desc: Our favourite flavours of the Pacific are presented in a Fresh Poly-platter in this series dedicated to inspiring Islanders worldwide. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka To Worlds
channel.desc: After a competitive trial, the teams are named and they come together for their very first camp. Their journey begins at the Aotearoa Elite Worlds Sprint camp in Kar?piro. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Atawhai Puumanawa
channel.desc: NEW: Featuring Te Atawhai Puumanawa, Whakaata M?ori presents Te Matatini o Te K?hui Maunga - the ultimate celebration of haka excellence. Experience the passion, precision, and power of Aotearoa's finest teams as they bring te reo, identity, and tradition to the stage. This is haka at its finest.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Only In Aotearoa
channel.desc: Short, sharp comedy skits from a distinctly M?ori perspective. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Don't Even
channel.desc: Uncle Sizzle?s employee of the month, Harley, is celebrated at a staff party where Mickey is unusually supportive. Meanwhile, Violet and Showboat go all out to get into the battle of the bands. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kair?kau
channel.desc: Set in the 1820s, the northern tribes have muskets from the Whiteman. They begin to invade other tribes and eventually arrive in Te Arawa. (R).

channel.title: Ahik?roa
channel.desc: A serial drama thats all about drama. Following a group of city based rangatahi as they navigate life. (R).

channel.title: T?hura

channel.desc: M?ori wordplay and wit in action as two teams go head-to-head on a given topic. (R).

channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Kura Tuatahi
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Kura Tuatahi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo Kokara
channel.desc: T?ku Reo K?kara shows the important role mothers play in te reo M?ori revitalisation and creating future generations of te reo M?ori speakers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Siblings Eraia and Lahaina Kiel teach basic skills in poi, haka and other traditional M?ori performing arts. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Wharekura
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Wharekura. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Homesteads
channel.desc: This episode centers around three Stirling Homesteads, each of which represents a significant time in their wh?nau history. This resilient wh?nau shares their deeply personal story and demonstrates how hardship has brought them even closer together. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Maeva Nui 2025
channel.desc: NEW: Coverage of the Cook Island Cultural Festival, Te Maeva Nui 2025. It includes a live stream of stage performances over 2days and a 1hr TV special on linear.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The First Inventors
channel.desc: Indigenous knowledge teams up with cutting-edge science to develop lifesaving medicines and combat climate change. But to tackle humanity's future challenges, first we need to heal the past. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Day One Shorts 2024
channel.desc: Lost at the night markets, Janjan tries to find his parents. While searching, he befriends Kiuga, a child of a family from the stalls who takes him on a fantastic journey to find his loved ones. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Convert
channel.desc: A lay preachers violent past is soon drawn into question and his faith put to the test, as he finds himself caught in the middle of a bloody war between M?ori tribes. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?hura
channel.desc: Niua and Hura travel to Te Hokianga-nui-?-Kupe to uncover the story behind the taniwh? ??rai Te Uru & Niua? who guard the mouth of Hokianga harbour. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Takaro Tribe
channel.desc: Ta?karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Ra?kau, Pond Koka?, Pu and Waea Wao live. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: When an old ponaturi warrior outsmarts the group and escapes, Rangi blames herself and dives into the dangerous waters to follow it to its underwater lair. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamaiti T? Spring
channel.desc: From truck to earth, the whanau plants hope for the future. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamariki Haka
channel.desc: Children from kura across the country showcase their haka skills. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mataora Digital
channel.desc: Amazing content curated for rangatahi, wh?nau and pakeke. Made by the Mataora team. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube Haka
channel.desc: Join Te Haakura and Atareta on the adventure of creating their own kapa haka group. Te N?tube Haka is made up of performers from different regions. We see how practicing separately will go down. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.title: Fresh 2025
channel.desc: Our favourite flavours of the Pacific are presented in a Fresh Poly-platter in this series dedicated to inspiring Islanders worldwide.

channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes. (R).

channel.title: Ng? Manu K?rero 2025
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori presents highlights of Ng? Manu K?rero from Jubilee Stadium, celebrating 60 years of rangatahi excellence in oratory and public speaking. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Sachie's Kitchen
channel.desc: Culinary rising star Sachie Nomura hosts this new cooking series celebrating Japanese cuisine and inspiring viewers at home with simple-to-make, amazing dishes. (R).

channel.title: Takaro Tribe

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te P?mu K?mara
channel.desc: It's the school holidays. While P?ora Patero and Grace are still plotting, Nan has a fun surprise for the tamariki. (R).

channel.title: Te P?mu K?mara
channel.desc: Marama has a new crush. The tamariki are offered a once in a lifetime opportunity. Tai and Amaia become distant. (R).

channel.title: Te P?mu K?mara
channel.desc: Tai and Amaia don't see eye to eye. N?kau meets a new friend. Grace and P?ora Patero's plan is put into action. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Why Apu?
channel.desc: NEW: We've covered the taiao issues currently facing Te Tair?whiti and now it's time to profile those on the ground trying to find altrernative pathways forward.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: NEW: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Once Were Gardeners
channel.desc: PREMIERE: A gardening show like none other, full of laughs, learnings and featuring some ?out the gate? characters whose m?tauranga, excitement and passion for the m?ra is seriously infectious. Meretini Bennett-Huxtable.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: NZ Wars: The Stories of Ruapekapeka
channel.desc: The Stories of Ruapekapeka, a documentary highlighting Northland's most infamous armed conflict, is hosted by Mihinarangi Forbes. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Crown Lynn
channel.desc: CROWN LYNN: A M?ori Story revisits a place and time in New Zealand history that was on the cusp of change both socially and politically through the eyes of Crown Lynn Pottery's former M?ori employees and their whanau. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Stolen Children Of Aotearoa
channel.desc: Reveals a forgotten chapter in New Zealand's history, exploring the profound impact of M?ori children being separated from their families and communities by the state. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Rewind
channel.desc: Music video series with curated NZ and Reo M?ori music. Includes old music videos updated with graphic factoids.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Aro
channel.desc: Join presenter and Tikitiki local Cushla Tangaere and the community as they show us why their RSA is special and what it means to them. We follow the community as they prepare for ANZAC day. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Toa Hunter Gatherer
channel.desc: Adventurer Owen Boynton presents a holistic view of gathering kai as he travels the country to meet like-minded kaitiaki and outdoor experts. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tui Teka's Trail
channel.desc: Tui helps a young farrier out with Max the stallion who front foots and double barrel kicks. Up the East Coast, Tui shares some tips and tricks. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tales From Zambia
channel.desc: Explore Zambia's diverse wildlife, from majestic elephants to playful baboons, through this captivating collection. Venture into breathtaking habitats and witness fascinating animal behaviours. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunt With Me
channel.desc: Ng?ti Hine FM DJ Amber Smith and her father head out in search of monster kingfish, while Gavin is deep in the Ruahine Ranges determined to fill the freezer with venison. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Feral
channel.desc: From wild hog hunting to silver carp fishing, adventure-loving culinary explorer Via Vang is ready to chase, kill, cook, and eat all the crazy creatures that have overstayed their welcome.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Rewind
channel.desc: Music video series with curated NZ and Reo M?ori music. Includes old music videos updated with graphic factoids. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunting Aotearoa
channel.desc: Join skilled hunter-gatherer, Peter Peeti, for another exciting hunting season. Pete is on the hunt for Red Deer and Wild Pigs in the Bay of Plenty. (R).[(96057)]
